Featured Lineage: Literary Minimalism

Ernest Hemingway

1899-1961

“The Sun Also Rises”

Raymond Carver

1938-1988

“What We Talk About...”

Tobias Wolff

b. 1945

“This Boy's Life”

The “iceberg theory” - show only the tip, but the reader feels the weight beneath. Hemingway's sparse prose influenced generations of writers.
